name: Slow Damage: Clean Dishes
storyline:
Shinkomi, a special administrative region of Japan ruled by the Takasato Group, is a city of rampant crime propelled by the country’s crippling recession. Here, fights and murders are a daily occurrence. In such a city, a certain presence is vital.
Enter ''Clean dishes''.

''Clean dishes'', also commonly known as "Sara-ya," is a cleaning service that tidies up the rooms where people have died, by suicide or by other means. The story revolves around Baku, a worker at “Clean dishes,” and his partner Shiro, who is eager to die.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: 『スロウ・ダメージ Clean dishes』PV【A-Zの新神海タイムス！】
